# mkdocs-llmstxt

> MkDocs plugin to generate an /llms.txt file.

This plugin automatically generates llms.txt files.

## Usage documentation

- [Overview](https://pawamoy.github.io/mkdocs-llmstxt/index.md)

## API reference

- [API reference](https://pawamoy.github.io/mkdocs-llmstxt/reference/api/index.md)
